summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 11th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to Ravenna Boulevard; East 47th Street, from 9th Avenue Northeast to 12th Avenue Northeast; East 52nd Street & East 55th Street, each from 10th Avenue Northeast to 12th Avenue Northeast; East 56th Street, form 10th Avenue Northeast to University Way; and southerly portion of Ravenna Boulevard from 10th Avenue Northeast to the east margin of 11th Avenue Northeast; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6691, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
